details: Mentored Python and Data projects, simplifying technical concepts for non-technical learners.
Collaborated with co-workers to create plans and applications to track and monitor student progress and engagement.
Discovered that average grades increased by 60% within 2 semesters.
Assessed and ranked AI-generated maths solutions, enhancing model accuracy by 15%.
Developed a structured evaluation framework, providing feedback, and correcting the mathematical model.
Improved model reliability and reasoning for deployment.
Developed actionable insights using financial data, with a regression model, contributing to a strategic case report.
Improved market evaluation by 30% over using no model.
Led quantitative analysis of 10+ case studies, revealing critical trends that shaped marketing and financial strategies.

projects.name: Emergency Vehicle Autonomous Driving (RL)
projects.description: Train an autonomous emergency vehicle model (ambulance, police, firefighter) within CARLA simulator, using Reinforcement Learning. The model makes use of LiDAR, RGB, GNSS, etc, and PPO for training, model was 4x faster in point A-B navigation compared to standard built-in autopilot.
projects.title: Emergency Vehicle Autonomous Driving (RL)

projects.name: Uber Price Prediction And Regression Model Analysis
projects.description: This project provides a comprehensive and extensive approach to predicting Uber prices using a variety of regression models. Through the use of data cleaning, exploratory data analysis, model training, hyperparameter tuning, and model evaluation. Gradient Boosting Regression was found to be the best model was the best for this dataset.
projects.title: Uber Price Prediction And Regression Model Analysis

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects, built with React, TypeScript, and the Next.js framework. The website also includes a terminal portfolio, which is a terminal-like interface to showcase my projects and experience.
projects.title: Portfolio Website

aboutMe: I’m Safoan, a Data Science student with a strong focus on Machine Learning and Neural Networks. My experience lies primarily in Python and SQL, and I actively broaden my knowledge by taking additional modules in computer science and finance. Beyond university, I pursue external courses to deepen my understanding and broaden my programming skills. My goal is to continuously learn and develop practical solutions to real world problems.
